settings.title: Settings
settings.indexing_note: Note: Indexing runs in the background. Large folders may take time.
settings.rebuild_desc: Clear current index and re-scan all configured paths. Try this if search results are inaccurate.
settings.rebuild_confirm: Are you sure you want to rebuild the index? This will clear existing data and re-scan, which may take some time.
settings.restart_desc: If search hangs, disconnects, or returns no results, try restarting the service.
settings.restart_confirm: Are you sure you want to restart the backend service? This will interrupt current tasks.
settings.debug_desc: Display database status, index statistics and system information for troubleshooting

algo.title: Algorithm Details
algo.description: This system uses SQLite FTS5 full-text search engine with Trigram tokenizer.
algo.rank_desc: Rank score represents the relevance between query and document. It is based on BM25 algorithm, considering term frequency and document length.
algo.precision_desc: Precision controls query expansion (synonyms, fuzzy matching, etc.). Higher precision means stricter matching.
